page.title: 07Parish Council Recent Issues
page.content: {Closure of sub post office}.Council wrote to MP.about closure.He replied that Aberford P.O. was safe. {Provision of Bowling Green}.Council is providing Bowling Green soon on site of the old Modern Sec. School. {Use of Swan Mill Farm Land.}The owners had been burning rubbish and refused to stop when asked to do so by the Council.They were forced to do so by the Department of the Environment on health grounds. {New Bus Terminus.}A new terminus at the north end of the village was built and a potential road safety hazard eliminated. {Parking on the bridge over Cock Beck.} The Council made several representations to the police and highways dept.over dangerous parking but no action has been taken as the police feel there is little danger.
